item.title: Non-fried Calamari
item.description: In a bowl, combine the flour (or ground almonds) and salt, and mix well. Add the cleaned and chopped squids, coating them thoroughly in the mixture. Cover the air fryer basket with parchment (baking paper) and arrange the squids evenly in the air fryer basket, and give them a light spray of olive oil. Cook at 180Â°C (350Â°F) for 12 minutes in the air fryer, or bake in the oven at 180Â°C (350Â°F) for 15 minutes.
